title: Cast It Into the Fire! (3C11)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Maneuver: Spot an Elf to make each opponent discard a card from his or her hand. Draw a card for each card discarded in this way.
Lore:	”'It should have been cast then into Orodruin's fire nigh at hand where it was made.'”
Rarity:	C
